thread.title: Texas Muslims show up in force to battle conservative lawmakers’ anti-Muslim agenda
thread.title_full: Texas Muslims show up in force to battle conservative lawmakers’ anti-Muslim agenda

author: Juliet Eilperin
title: Texas Muslims show up in force to battle conservative lawmakers’ anti-Muslim agenda
text: Texas Muslims show up in force to battle conservative lawmakers’ anti-Muslim agenda   Just days before CAIR’s biennial ‘Texas Muslim Capitol Day’, freshman State Representative Kyle Biedermann hosted a forum on exposing radical Islamic terrorism in the state that took shots at CAIR’s reputation. ( ) RELATED LINKS - Just days before CAIR’s biennial ‘Texas Muslim Capitol Day’, freshman State Representative Kyle Biedermann hosted a forum on exposing radical Islamic terrorism in the state that took shots at CAIR’s reputation.
